title: How to Make Crispy Hazelnut Bananas

steps.headline: Add hazelnuts to mixture and mix together quickly.
Dip peeled sliced bananas into orange juice.
Roll in coconut mixture until the banana is well coated.
Bake or fry with favorite oil or shortening.
steps.description: If frying, fry for 1 - 2 minutes over a medium - high heat. If baking, bake for about 10 minutes in a pre-warmed moderately hot oven.

steps.headline: Serve with ice-cream, cream, soy cream or soy ice-cream.

text: Combine coconut and sugar.  Add hazelnuts to mixture and mix together quickly.  Dip peeled sliced bananas into orange juice.  Roll in coconut mixture until the banana is well coated.  Bake or fry with favorite oil or shortening. If frying, fry for 1 - 2 minutes over a medium - high heat. If baking, bake for about 10 minutes in a pre-warmed moderately hot oven. Serve with ice-cream, cream, soy cream or soy ice-cream.
